comment.body: Shakespeare & Sons
Mall of Berlin have an English book shop.

As far as I know bookstores don't really sell textbooks, no matter what language. I think you should be looking for school supply stores but I guess those will rarely have material for English natives.
Berlin Book Nook near U Schönleinstr. is a fantastic used book store
You can try the American history library in Hallesches Tor, sign up for free  and you can find all kinds of books there, I think you might find what u want as well
Shakespeares and sons
Otherland has a large section of English fantasy and science fiction books.

You seem to have missed the english bookstore range at Dussmann, it's separate and has a ton of fiction on two storeys. Find the sphinx, then he
ad to the right.
If you want to buy English childrens books: Mouse & Bear Books in Boxhagener Straße
"she says"? also plenty of art books & magazine stores, mostly in english, like "do you read me?"

Have you tried Lehmanns near charite? I think it specifies in textbooks so could imagine it has english titles :) Otherwise try kleinanzeigen, but you’d have to be specific and search subjects or disciplines? Also I would recommend Cafe Tasso near frankfurter tor, they have a great english book section downstairs on the shelves on the left, and all the books are something like 2/2,50€ each. I’ve found some great ones there!
